error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'second_night_percent_num' (20) was used instead of 'total_pages' (500).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 246
The first night he read 20% of his 500-page book so he read 0.2*500 = <<20*0.01*500=100>>100 pages
The book is 500 pages and he read 100 so that leaves 500-100 = <<500-100=400>>400 pages
The second night he reads 20% of the 20 pages so he read 0.2*20 = <<20*0.01*20=4>>4 pages
The book is now 400 pages and he read 4 so that leaves 400-4 = <<400-4=396>>396 pages
The third night he read 30% of the book so he read 0.3*500 = <<30*0.01*500=150>>150 pages
The book is now 396 pages and he read 150 pages so he has 396-150 =<<396-150=246>>246 pages left to read
